comments(from Keon).ganache-cli and truffle: -=I wanted to seperate from my global npm=-
comments(from Keon).added cli scripts: I've made some scripts to smoothen the dev process but have not erased any pre-existing. If I have time I would love to make node env for 3 OS.

name: web3-engineering-assignment
description: An assignment for prospective web3 engineers @ SportX.bet

scripts.deploy: call cmd /K "title deploy && timeout /t 10 /nobreak && npm run migrate && npm run test"
scripts.dev: start cmd /K "npm run eth" & call cmd /K "title deploy && npm run deploy"

author: Julian Wilson <julian@sportx.bet>
